argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dmmcand.a | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | dmmcand.b | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | dmmcand.c | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | dmmcand.bn0 | |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) |
| 5 | 2, 3 | #P_mulcld | |- ( ph -> ( B x. C ) e. CC ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 5, 4 | #P_div32d | |- ( ph -> ( ( A / B ) x. ( B x. C ) ) = ( A x. ( ( B x. C ) / B ) ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 2, 4 | #P_divcan3d | |- ( ph -> ( ( B x. C ) / B ) = C ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( A x. ( ( B x. C ) / B ) ) = ( A x. C ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( A x. C ) = ( A x. C ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 8, 9 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( A / B ) x. ( B x. C ) ) = ( A x. C ) ) |
